title: Software Developer
highlights: Worked on a React Native workforce management app used daily by NHS staff across multiple Trusts.
Integrated new backend APIs to support detailed leave entitlements; cut manual HR adjustments by 30-40% and improved payroll accuracy.
Reworked core leave journeys such as applications, entitlements and approvals, leading to a 25% increase in feature adoption.
Built and maintained key workforce features including Shift Swap, Timesheets and native calendar synchronisation.
Performance and workflow improvements helped managers save 200-250 staff hours per month (£8k-£10k in operational savings).
Contributed to Liaison Link becoming the highest-rated product in the company’s SaaS portfolio.

projects.name: SendSprint Admin Dashboard (Internal Platform)
bullets: Built the front end for an internal dashboard to monitor users and transactions; reduced manual reconciliation by 40%.
Implemented retry flows for failed transactions.
Added role-based access control, improving security and operational clarity.
Optimised performance for high transaction volumes using lazy loading and caching.
Built reporting tools and analytics widgets.

projects.name: SendSprint Consumer Web App (Remittance Platform)
bullets: Developed a web app for international money transfers with real-time status updates, driving a 30% increase in repeat transactions.
Redesigned the KYC flow with Veriff into a clear, step-by-step experience, reducing verification time to under 5 min.
Added 3D Secure and additional fraud checks; reduced fraud by over 35% within 3 months.
Improved stability and performance through better API handling, cutting page load times by 40%.

projects.name: SendScript Business Platform (B2B Payments)
bullets: Built a B2B payments platform for SMEs and corporates, reducing onboarding from days to under 24 hours via automated KYC.
Implemented bulk payments with CSV/Excel uploads and client-side validation, reducing manual processing by 60%.
Added multi-user access with roles (Admin/Finance/Viewer) to support corporate workflows.
The platform launch increased overall transaction volume by 40% in the first quarter and opened a new revenue stream for the company.

projects.name: Specnota SaaS Collaboration Platform
bullets: Designed and built the front-end architecture using React and TypeScript, helping teams cut document preparation time by 50% and speed up approvals by 40%.
Implemented real-time collaborative editing with WebSockets and shared state; reduced version conflicts by 30%.
Added autosave, offline support and local recovery, eliminating data loss for users.
Built inline comments and change tracking tied to document sections, reducing review cycles by 40%.

projects.name: Jarvis Pension Fintech Mobile App (iOS & Android)
bullets: Developed key React Native screens that improved onboarding completion by 25% through simpler navigation and clearer UI.
Built interactive charts for balances, growth and contributions to make financial data easier to understand.
Created a reusable component system, reducing development time for new features by around 30%.
Improved performance and data security, helping the app reach production readiness.

projects.name: ConnecMe2 Mentorship & Career Platform (Web & Mobile)
bullets: Built both web and mobile apps using a shared design system, contributing to a 40% growth in active users after beta.
Added real-time chat and notifications, increasing average session time by 30%.
Implemented file uploads to AWS S3 with retry logic to handle unstable networks.
Optimised performance with lazy loading, caching and React Query, reducing load times by 35%.

title: Front end Developer
highlights: Built and maintained full-stack applications with a strong focus on front-end performance and reliability.
Integrated SQL-backed APIs and implemented caching strategies to improve system performance.
Led front-end development of a landlord management platform, onboarding 20+ landlords within 2 months of launch.

title: Frontend Developer
highlights: Participated in a full rebuild of the company website from scratch with a team of engineers.
Expanded technical expertise by working with Python/Django alongside front-end technologies.
Developed ERP systems for multiple organizations to streamline operational workflows.

title: Software Developer intern
highlights: Assisted in the development of web applications using JavaScript, HTML, CSS.
Supported debugging, testing, and feature releases in production environments.
Worked with Git and Agile workflows; gained hands-on experience with APIs and databases.
